    from Tkinter import *
import tkMessageBox
 
def callback():
    if tkMessageBox.askokcancel("Quit", "Do you really wish to quit?"):
        root.destroy()
 
root = Tk()
root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", callback)
 
root.mainloop()

def callback(event):

root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", callback)
root.bind('<Key>',callback)
